title: 'Leakage'
body: The bottle is very good lookwise but it leaks if we keep it in car or while traveling. Overall it's good. Worth buying

title: 'Wrost product till the time'
body: The product made with fully unscientific way, and low quality of materials. Even it's despatched also casually made. The top of bottle was missing. More ever it is a wrost product with high price!

title: 'Quality is very cheap'
body: 'It is not rigid. Even Coca Cola bottles are better than this..'

title: 'Bottles have leakage problem when kept horizontal'
body: 'Bottles have leakage problem when kept horizontal'

title: 'Low quality'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. Low quality'

title: 'Flimsy quality'
body: 'The bottle cap doesn’t close well. Water leaks when placed horizontally.'

title: 'Pathetic product'
body: It may look promising but it's not leak proof and placing a return request was the biggest pain. No one was available to pick this product. I had to place 3 return request after speaking with the customer service.

title: 'received with scratches.'
body: 'Product packaging was very bad i found with scratches on each bottle cap.'

title: 'Content inside bottle not visible easily but otherwise very good'
body: 'Dark grey or black not good rest colours good'
